venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
In this seminar, you will use EFT (Emotional Freedom Techniques) to change a sense of pressure and entrapment - with regard to deadlines and time limitations in your life - so that you have a gratifying experience of being in control of your own time at all times. You will be able to be the master of your deadlines.


You'll also enjoy a group hypnosis session facilitated by Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist.


Preregistration suggested as seats are limited.


Benefit Event - Donations welcomed.

All proceeds to benefit Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a charitable non-profit foundation that helps people find new pathways to healing and wholeness.

 

For additional contact information, visit : http://www.hypnosis.ws

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Abolishing Deadline Distress - Expand Your Time
